Today in County Sligo, surf is on with 7 ft @ 13s WNW at Strandhill and Easkey, but watch for fresh 15 mph S winds making it a bit choppy. Tomorrow, conditions improve with 7 ft @ 11s WNW and lighter 8 mph S winds, making for cleaner waves at Strandhill and Easkey. Day after, the swell drops to 4 ft @ 10s NW with moderate 12 mph W winds, still offering fun rides at Strandhill and Easkey Left. Best: tomorrow.
